author: snichol
msg: Support valid XML namespace constructs in deployment descriptor
mappings for Microsoft interop, e.g. it is now legal to specify
qname="inputInteger" rather than the invalid construct

author: snichol
msg: - Remove output to System.out and System.err
- Provide more precise and complete exception information
- Improve formatting (mainly indentation) of the source

author: snichol
msg: Add serialization of collection/map interfaces and concrete classes

author: snichol
msg: Fix EJB and CORBA providers to check deployment descriptor to

author: snichol
msg: Call RPCRouter.validCall to check that method has been "exposed"
